item.description:
Rialto is admired as one of the best restaurants in the Boston area. Cheap it is not, but the service is excellent and they care a great deal about food. See for yourself at:
www.rialto-restaurant.com

I was there last week and enjoyed the:
- Tuna crudo with avocado, chilis and radishes;
- Macomber and parsley soup with curried snails on toast; and
- Lasagna with rabbit, sweetbreads and porcini

(One of our members, Amanda, was at the next table. She was hired last month as their director of public relations. She'll make sure we are treated well!)
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for the Meetup group
item.name: Rialto
